alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Fulton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:26PM EDT until July 23 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Bedford County in south central Pennsylvania... Fulton County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 526 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crystal Springs, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Breezewood, Clearville, McConnellsburg, Harrisonville, Big Cove Tannery, Crystal Springs, Fort Littleton, Needmore, Valley-Hi, Saluvia, Sideling Hill Rest Area and Locust Grove. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 70 from mile markers 147 to 165. The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 157 to 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
